item.title: How to optimize sql query
item.description: Optimize network Keep connection. Create connection pooling. Integrate many query in a connection. Optimize query execution Avoid n+1 problem. Using EXPLAIN query to inspect the query plan. Indexing. Partition. Sharding. Scale hardware Vertical scale (scale up) Horizontal scale using Master-Slave architecture (scale out).

item.title: Isolation property in ACID
item.description: Read Phenomena Dirty reads: if you are in an inflight transaction, you can read something that some other transaction has written but didnâ€™t really commit yet. Non-repeatable reads: if you read a row once, then read it again, the second read could see different data if another transaction has modified it. Phantom reads: if you run a query twice, the second query could see different rows if another transaction has inserted or deleted them.
